Name: Old Star 2 by 1
Description: This here is how the Old Star do. Just 2 planks of nicely cut Fibron Wood held together with a few metal bands and nails.     Here at Old Star, We don't use a 1 by 1. Why you may ask? The wood cutter doesn't want to waste his metal by wrapping 2 tiny chuncks of wood and calling it a block!
